trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.
trans-unit.target: Énumère les valeurs de l'état de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> property uses <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> to indicate the current state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> propriété utilise <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> pour indiquer l’état actuel de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> properties use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> to indicate state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> et <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> utilisation de propriétés <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> pour indiquer l’état de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> lorsque le <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> événement est déclenché.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> is ready to generate speech from a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Indique que le <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> est prêt à générer le discours à partir d'une invite.
Indique que <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> est en cours d'énonciation.
